√khid 'tear'

present: [6.] khidáti etc.   -- khintte   -- passive:

[perfect: cikheda  acīkhidat  akhaitsīt  khetsyati  khettā  ]

verbal: khinna E.+  -khídya  -khídam  

secondary: passive: khidyate etc. E.+  khidyati etc. E.+   -- intensive: cekhid-   -- desiderative: cikhitsa-   -- causative: khedayati  khedayate E.+  

derivatives: -khida  khidrá RV.  khidvāṅs RV.  khéda V.+  khédā V.+  khedin C.  khedana C.  kheditavya E.  khedayitavya C.
